verbose_text: Shoot N 2 -fixed (kg ha -1) was calculated as :(3) Shoot N 2 -fixed (kg ha -1) =% Ndfa x whole shoot N The amount of N 2 -fixed in the whole plant as reported in this paper was calculated assuming that 30% of N 2 fixed was present in the roots :(4) Total N 2 -fixed (kg ha -1) = shoot N 2 -fixed/(0.70) Eq.
